tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This is an introduction to installing and exploring the Oracle Database 23ai Free

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Domains and Annotations
tutorials.description: Learn how Oracle Database 23ai's Data Usecase Domains and Schema Annotations solve healthcare data governance challenges.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: JSON and SQL
tutorials.description: Try out JSON and SQL capabilities in 23ai

tutorials.title: Lab 3: AI Vector Search
tutorials.description: Explore AI Vector Search capabilities and create healthcare tables with vector search functionality

tutorials.title: Lab 5: (Bonus) SQL Updates
tutorials.description: Learn how to efficiently update records in your database using advanced SQL techniques.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Template to link to Need Help lab at the end of workshop. Change 'CHANGE-ME' in link below to need-help-livelabs.md or need-help-freetier.md
